games.driving

Class Driving

  • java.lang.Object
    • other.Screen
      • games.driving.Driving

  • public class Driving
extends Screen
    Subclass of Screen. Represents the drawing surface on which the Driving game will occur and therefore handles that game's IO.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class other.Screen

        DRAWING_HEIGHT, DRAWING_WIDTH

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new Driving object with the following parameters

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Draws the game on the PApplet, and therefore handles practically all of GUI and outputs of this game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Driving

        public Driving(Question question,
               Player player,
               int conference,
               float speed,
               java.util.ArrayList<Question> answers,
               java.util.ArrayList<Question> wrongAnswers,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> rightAnswers,
               int index,
               FBLATriviaTester papp)
        Creates a new Driving object with the following parameters
        Parameters:
        question - the question this game will test the player on
        player - the player who will play this game
        conference - the conference/competition this game belongs to
        speed - the general speed of the game, used to measure difficulty
        answers - the answers to the question of this game
        wrongAnswers - all the player's incorrect answers from previous minigames
        rightAnswers - all the player's correct answers from previous minigames
        index - this game's spot in the database, used to track progress
        papp - the PApplet this game will run in
